entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Nipigon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:24 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cameron Falls 02:00 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
Temperature: 1.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 1.3°C
Wind: NNE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with rain. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h before morning. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 12:28 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 14 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature falling to minus 14 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 12:28 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Local blowing snow early in the evening. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 24 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 12:28 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 12. Forecast issued 12:28 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 23. Forecast issued 12:28 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
